title: Medical Devices
description: We offer a wide range of Medical devices for different surgical procedures. Our line of devices is the latest technologies, ergonomically designed, easy to use, and assures a high level of operative and patient safety.

title: Laparoscopy
description: Laparoscopy is an operation performed in the abdomen or pelvis using small incisions with the aid of an Endovision camera system. The laparoscope aids in diagnosis or therapeutic surgical procedures with a few small cuts in the abdomen. We here at FORCETO INDIA offer a complete range of products for standard and for specialist operative techniques. Our ergonomically designed technology provides the perfect instrument for every operation and assures long service life and ultimate workplace precision.

title: Hysteroscopy Set
description: Hysteroscopy is diagnostic as well as an operative procedure performed in gynecology. Hysteroscopy is used to diagnose, prevent, and treatment of diseases in female patients. We here at FORCETO INDIA continuously develop new products for use in hospitals, by gynecologists and medical specialists.

title: Endo Urology
description: We have been developing advanced instruments for open and endoscopic treatment of urological conditions. We here at FORCETO INDIA offer a complete range of products for cystoscopy, Resectoscope, Stricture treatment, Lithotripsy, Nephroscopy, Uretero-renoscopy, and all Pediatric applications. We supply solutions for all urological procedures and offer a comprehensive range of instruments for mono-polar, bi-polar, and laser-based operative procedures.

title: ENT
description: We here at FORCETO INDIA have a facility to provide types of equipment and Instruments for diagnostic and operative treatments in the ear, nose, and throat surgery.
Different kind of ENT surgery sets like:

title: Arthroscopy Set
description: Arthroscopy is a minimally invasive, Surgical Procedure (Diagnostic as well as therapeutic). Orthopedic operations include treatment on joints like - knees, shoulders, hips, elbows, and the upper ankle. We here at FORCETO INDIA have a facility to provide equipment and Instruments for arthroscopy, open joint operations, orthopedics, and sports medicine.

title: General Surgery
description: General surgery is a surgical specialty that focuses on the alimentary canal and abdominal contents including the esophagus, stomach, small intestine, large intestine, liver, pancreas, gallbladder, appendix, bile ducts, and often the thyroid gland. The surgical sector covers the prevention, detection, conservative and operative treatment, aftercare, and rehabilitation of surgical conditions, injuries, and complications arising from injuries, as well as innate and acquired changes in shape and malformations of vessels, internal organs including the heart, supporting and movement organs and oncological surgery as well as reconstructive and transplant surgery. General surgery is a sub-set of surgery covering the basic provision of surgery (Basic Surgery) as well as aspects of visceral and vascular surgery.
We here at FORCETO INDIA have a facility to provide Instruments for diagnostic and operative treatments.
specification: All Sets (Major/ Minor/ Hystectomy / Laparoscopy / D & C etc.)

title: Orthopaedic Surgery
description: Orthopaedics encompasses medical conditions that are aimed at treating or preventing deformities, illnesses, or injuries to the skeleton and its supporting structures (such as the bones, joints, muscles, and tendons). For orthopaedic surgery, INDUS GERMAN provides a broad selection of goods.

title: Neurosurgery
description: In neurosurgery, conditions affecting the central and peripheral nerve systems are identified and surgically treated. A modern and user-friendly set of tools for neuro-surgical treatments on the brain, spine, spinal marrow, and peripheral nerves has been created by INDUS GERMAN. For many neurological surgeries, our Instruments and Retractor system provides the ideal platform

title: Spine Surgery
description: One of the most prevalent reasons for neurosurgical intervention is disorders of the spine. At INDUS GERMAN, we provide a full line of equipment for invasive surgical treatments to treat disc and spine issues.

title: Micro Surgery
description: A surgical speciality called plastic surgery focuses on repairing facial and physical deformities brought on by disease, burns, trauma, and birth problems. For practices, clinics, and operation teams around the world, INDUS GERMAN provides a flexible choice of solutions using the most recent technologies.
